The `/link/token/get` endpoint gets information about a previously-created `link_token` using the
`/link/token/create` endpoint. It can be useful for debugging purposes.

api_name: Plaid API Endpoints: Create an end customer

body.raw:
{
  "client_id": "{{client_id}}",
  "secret": "{{secret_key}}",
  "address": {
        "city": "City of Industry",
        "country_code": "US",
        "postal_code": "91744",
        "region": "CA",
        "street": "1 Main St."
    },
    "application_name": "Wonderwallet",
    "company_name": "Wonderful Solutions",
    "is_bank_addendum_completed": true,
    "is_diligence_attested": true,
    "legal_entity_name": "Wonderful Solutions, LLC",
    "products": ["transactions"],
    "website": "www.example.com",
    "redirect_uris": ["https://www.example.com/oauth.html"],
    "assets_under_management": {
      "amount": 10000,
      "iso_currency_code": "USD"
    }
    
}

functionality: NO DESC IN POSTMAN
